title: ‘I’m Incredibly Lucky to be Alive’: Magnus Sheffield Shares Emotions of Tour de Suisse Tragedy
content:
'The crash reminded me of how fragile life can be': Promising American star begins 2024 with a new appreciation toward his career.

Read the full article at ‘I’m Incredibly Lucky to be Alive’: Magnus Sheffield Shares Emotions of Tour de Suisse Tragedy on Velo.
author: ahood
